articles.title: Samsung's New Galaxy Foldables Will Debut in Paris on July 10 - Gizmodo
articles.description: Oui, this will also likely be the official debut of the Galaxy Ring.
articles.content: Samsungs next generation batch of devices is coming next month. The company has officially announced that Galaxy Unpacked will happen on July 10 at 6 a.m. PT/9 a.m. ET. The main event will be live-st… [+1674 chars]
